info.brief_description: A gay shrinking story with a choice of five hot men to choose from
info.description:
The story begins with a choice of five giants, you must choose one to begin the story with but the others can appear later. You can add other giants, as long as they’re male. Any GTS will be removed, as will any shrinking women; this is gay only.

If you wish to kill off the main character you are entitled to do so, but please leave an option before hand allowing the character to live. I.e. If you are going to have the character be crushed under a sneaker, as the sneaker is bearing down upon him end the current chapter and leave two options: ‘He gets crushed’ ‘He dives out the way’. Alternately you could have him be crushed and put the option: ‘He dies’ ‘He discovers he is unkillable.’

Early on in this story an option appears where you must decide if your character is the only one shrunk, or if several other students are shrunk too. If you are following the single shrink route you are free to add as many giants as you wish, but do not add any other shrunken men.

The giants can also be shrunk, whether by the tiny man/men finding a way to get revenge or another giant getting greedy.

What is allowed?
Sex is allowed, though gay sex only.
Vore is allowed, though shrunken only. No FS vore. Oral, Anal, Dick and Other Vore are all acceptable.
Crushing is allowed, though as mentioned above leave an option where the character survives.
Various fetishes i.e. Leather, BDSM, Scat, Watersports Are fine as long as there is warning before the actions begins so that those who don’t enjoy that fetish can avoid it.

Other than that, have fun!
